channel.title: knowledge-bases on CopeNLU
channel.description: Recent content in knowledge-bases on CopeNLU

item.title: Knowledge Base Population
item.description: Information extraction is concerned with extracting information about entities, phrases and relations between them from text to populate knowledge bases, such as extracting “employee-at” relations. Within this context, we have worked on automatic knowledge base completion, knowledge base cleansing and detecting scientific keyphrases in text.
